allow:
Bash(git -C "C:/Users/oguzy/projects/nextjs-blog" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete blog system with VPS deployment support

- Full Next.js 16 blog with admin panel
- Prisma + PostgreSQL database
- NextAuth authentication
- Lexical rich text editor
- AI content generation (OpenAI)
- Media management (Vercel Blob + Local storage)
- VPS deployment with Docker Compose
- Automatic installation script
- Nginx reverse proxy with SSL support
EOF
)")
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" auth login --web --git-protocol https)

Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" repo create nextjs-blog --public --source=. --remote=origin --push --description "Next.js 16 Blog with Admin Panel, Prisma, NextAuth, AI Content Generation, VPS Docker Deployment")
